Widget.name: Explain Query
Widget.Description: Display a graphical representation of Index6 queries. 'debug' must contain 'ast' (or 'all') in feed advanced parameters.

Option.name: Widget Title
Option.Description: Widget title. If blank, no name is displayed.

Option.name: Expanded by default
Option.Description: Defines whether the query is to be explained by default.

Option.name: Display node arguments
Option.Description: Defines whether to display arguments for each node (arguments correspond to node-specific information, e.g. 'word' for #alphanum).

Option.name: Display node options
Option.Description: Defines whether to display options for each node.

Option.name: Display node contributed counts
Option.Description: Defines whether to display the number of query-matching dids that match each node.

Option.name: Display node estimated counts
Option.Description: Defines whether to display the estimated counts for each node.

Option.name: Show match flow
Option.Description: If activated, the edge width will reflect the number of results matched by the node.
